titles.title: Designating majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Mr. Pappas asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/26/1997--Introduced. Elects the following Members to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure: (1) Jon D. Fox; (2) Thomas M. Davis; (3) Frank A. LoBiondo; and (4) J.C. Watts, Jr.
